document.full_text: like most veteran horse racing handicappers privileged to inside information, i have been loath to disclose the secrets of my selection process, honed over 20 years of betting on the kentucky derby and that could prove highly valuable to anyone planning to bet  this coming saturday.
document.title: the rail: use at own risk: a derby-winning breeder handicaps the derby
lines_and_colors: like most veteran horse racing handicappers privileged to inside information, i have been loath to disclose the secrets of my selection process, honed over 20 years of betting on the kentucky derby and that could prove highly valuable to anyone planning to bet  this coming saturday.
